system.description:
At the start of a Conflict, you immediately perform a villainous monologue on your enemies as you attempt to break their will. You make an opposed @CHECK[wlp wlp] check against a target of their choice. Depending on the outcome the following happens:

  • You win. All targets are @EFFECT[shaken] until they overcome your arguments. At the beginning of each round one of your targets may attempt a rebuke using the same check as above.

  • You lose. All targets gain @EFFECT[Compendium.fu-azure-compendia.effects.hnXVEabmOmtGQtNv]{Brilliant Conviction} for 1 round
